005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ICollectionValue;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.IArrayItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
018
019import java.util.ArrayList;
020import java.util.List;
021
022import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
023
024/**
025 * Implements the XPath 3.1 <a href=
026 * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-append">array:append</a>
027 * function.
028 */
029public final class ArrayAppend {
030  private static final String NAME = "append";
031  @NonNull
032  static final IFunction SIGNATURE = IFunction.builder()
033      .name(NAME)
034      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS_ARRAY)
035      .deterministic()
036      .contextIndependent()
037      .focusIndependent()
038      .argument(IArgument.builder()
039          .name("array")
040          .type(IArrayItem.class)
041          .one()
042          .build())
043      .argument(IArgument.builder()
044          .name("appendage")
045          .type(IItem.class)
046          .zeroOrMore()
047          .build())
048      .returnType(IArrayItem.class)
049      .returnOne()
050      .functionHandler(ArrayAppend::execute)
051      .build();
052
053  private ArrayAppend() {
054    // disable construction
055  }
056
057  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
058  @NonNull
059  private static <T extends ICollectionValue> ISequence<IArrayItem<T>> execute(@NonNull IFunction function,
060      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
061      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
062      IItem focus) {
063    IArrayItem<T> array = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(
064        arguments.get(0).getFirstItem(true)));
065    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
066    T appendage = (T) arguments.get(1).toCollectionValue();
067
068    return ISequence.of(append(array, appendage));
069  }
070
071  /**
072   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
073   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-append">array:append</a>.
074   *
075   * @param <T>
076   *          the type of items in the given Metapath array
077   * @param array
078   *          the target Metapath array
079   * @param appendage
080   *          the Metapath item to append to the identified array
081   * @return a new array containing the modification
082   */
083  @NonNull
084  public static <T extends ICollectionValue> IArrayItem<T> append(
085      @NonNull IArrayItem<T> array,
086      @NonNull T appendage) {
087
088    List<T> copy = new ArrayList<>(array);
089    copy.add(appendage);
090
091    return IArrayItem.ofCollection(copy);
092  }
093}
